description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in iberezansky 3D FlipBook – PDF Flipbook Viewer, Flipbook Image Gallery allows Stored XSS.This issue affects 3D FlipBook – PDF Flipbook Viewer, Flipbook Image Gallery: from n/a through 1.15.6.

product.name: 3D FlipBook – PDF Flipbook Viewer, Flipbook Image Gallery
